content: When people have questions about LLVM that are not clearly addressed by the documentation they could find, where is a good place to go? I have found that there is an IRC and a discord server - have people been successful with either of those? I've asked my question in the discord server for now
I should probably clarify that its not that I have been unsuccessful in getting help - just wanted to ask because its better than trial and erroring these things
I've asked questions about clangd on the discord with some success

See also https://rust-lang.github.io/compiler-team/working-groups/llvm/.

I was also gonna say https://rust-lang.github.io/compiler-team/working-groups/llvm/, but looks we have no LLVM experts listed there. But I know I've seen Nikita Popov be a common ask-guy for LLVM-related things.
